DOC.brief_summary: Prolonged fasting may increase organic response trauma . Carbohydrate-based drink test may reduce insulin resistance . No study far aim examine possible benefit whey protein drink composition preoperative drink .
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Feeding With Whey Protein Plus Carbohydrate Drink Acute Phase Response Insulin Resistance
DOC.detailed_description: The patient randomize two group : carbohydrate-protein group ( CHO-P ) control group ( CO ) . The patient reeive specific drink group even prior surgery three hour operation . The CHO-P group receive 474 ml ( even drink ) 237 ml ( 3h prior operation drink ) solution contain 14 % whey protein ( 100 % lactoalbumin ) , 86 % carbohydrate ( 45 % hydrolyze corn starch 55 % sucrose ) 0 % lipid ( Resource® Breeze - Nestlé , São Paulo , Brasil ) CO group receive volume water . Outcome measure On day surgery first postoperative day blood sample collect glucose , insulin , triglyceride , albumin , pre-albumin , CRP , α-1-acid glycoprotein ( α-1-GA ) assay . HOMA-IR calculate
DOC.criteria: Adults ( 1865 yearsold ) Both sexes Candidates elective moderate operation open cholecystectomy , laparoscopic cholecystectomy unilateral repair inguinal hernia ) . Acute cholecystitis Diabetes mellitus Chronic kidney failure Chronic liver disease ot serum bilirubin great 2 mg/dL , body mass index ( BMI ) 35Kg/m2 American Anesthesiologists Association ( ASA ) score 2 Gastroesophageal reflux Gastroparesis intestinal obstruction Patients noncompliance study protocol , associate operation , present significant intraoperative occurrence , experience prolong operation ( last 3 hour ) also exclude .
